content: holiday bell features a classic bell shape adorned with a delicate ruffled border holiday bell crochet along video right hand wreath https //youtu be/ys7ip15jxgo left hand wreath https //youtu be/rqlr7-58pow beginners to advanced crocheters can create this pattern with the following techniques -magic_ring -single_crochet single_crochet -single_crochet increase increase -half_double_crochet half_double_crochet -chain chain -fastening off the pattern is written in u s crochet terms complete with clear instructions and video tutorial to help you along the way holiday bell is crocheted in continuous spirals without joining the rounds i suggest using a stitch marker or different color yarn to keep track of each round holiday bell is crocheted in worsted weight yarn and is approximately 2 5 inches tall be aware that size may vary depending on the yarn and hook size used gauge is not particularly important just be consistent with the gauge you are using and most importantly have fun supplies needed for this pattern worsted weight yarn - i do not recommend bulky/extra bulky weight yarn for this pattern e 3 5mm crochet hook yarn/darning needle scissors locking stitch markers gold floss optional 20mm jingle bell join my ravelry group so i can get to know you better https //www ravelry com/groups/yarn-society do not distribute sell or share this pattern please feel free to sell the items you make from this shop
